job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of building and maintaining software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of developing and verifying software components, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
job_tasks.justification: Paired programming and code review are established practices within software development to improve code quality.

job_tasks.phrase: Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the application of software engineering principles to build and deliver robust software.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding product requirements and translating them into actionable development tasks, demonstrating business alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and exploratory activities can involve model development or experimentation, which aligns with 'Modeling' in a broader sense of creating new solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.
Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.

Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development tasks, including design, implementation, testing, and maintenance of NX CAM software. There is no mention of Generative AI, LLMs, or related technologies, placing it outside the scope of a GenAI Engineer.
